info.title: Rice Leafs
info.subtitle: An image collection four rice diseases
info.description:
### Context

I found this dataset when it was not uploaded on Kaggle and was scattered across the internet. This dataset is a collection of multiple data sets I found online. The size of this dataset is ~ 7 GB due to the high resolution of images. The number of images in the dataset is
3355 ```.jpg``` files.
 
### Content

The dataset has been divided into two groups, ```train``` and ```validation```.
Inside the two folders are 4 categories of types:
- BrownSpot 
- Healthy
- Hispa
- LeafBlast

**Note:**  The image resolution in the images is not uniform.

### Possible Datasets that can be used alongside
- [Rice Leaf Disease Dataset by Marsh](https://www.kaggle.com/vbookshelf/rice-leaf-diseases)
- [Rice Image Dataset by Huy Minh Do](https://www.kaggle.com/minhhuy2810/rice-diseases-image-dataset?)
- [Plant Pathology2020](https://www.kaggle.com/c/plant-pathology-2020-fgvc7/data?)

### Resources:
[UCI - Rice Disease](https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Rice+Leaf+Diseases)
